statements: UPSERT INTO InsurancePolicy(policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_type, premium_amount, start_date, end_date, is_active) VALUES('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', 'Alice Smith', 'Life Insurance', 500.00, '2022-01-01', '2023-01-01', true)

UPSERT INTO InsurancePolicy(policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_type, premium_amount, start_date, end_date, is_active) VALUES('456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', 'Bob Johnson', 'Car Insurance', 300.00, '2022-02-01', '2023-02-01', true)

UPSERT INTO InsurancePolicy(policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_type, premium_amount, start_date, end_date, is_active) VALUES('789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', 'Eve Williams', 'Home Insurance', 700.00, '2022-03-01', '2023-03-01', true)

UPSERT INTO policy (policy_id, policy_type, policy_holder_id, start_date, end_date) VALUES (1, 'Health', 101, '2022-01-01', '2022-12-31') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE policy_type='Health', policy_holder_id=101, start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-12-31';

UPSERT INTO policy (policy_id, policy_type, policy_holder_id, start_date, end_date) VALUES (2, 'Car', 102, '2022-02-01', '2023-02-28') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE policy_type='Car', policy_holder_id=102, start_date='2022-02-01', end_date='2023-02-28';

UPSERT INTO claim (claim_id, policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount, status) VALUES (1, 1, '2022-03-15', 500.00, 'Pending') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE claim_date='2022-03-15', claim_amount=500.00, status='Pending';

UPSERT INTO PolicyHolder (id, name, age, policy_type, policy_amount) VALUES ('502b3590-6075-4e09-9749-ceb34c8aae3d', 'Alice', 35, 'Life', 10000.50) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name='Alice', age=35, policy_type='Life', policy_amount=10000.50;

UPSERT INTO InsuranceCompany (company_id, company_name, location, contact_number) VALUES ('8a952241-12e3-46f4-a9cd-89185fb97e25', 'ABC Insurance', 'New York', '123-456-7890') ON CONFLICT (company_id) DO UPDATE SET company_name='ABC Insurance', location='New York', contact_number='123-456-7890';

UPSERT INTO Policy (policy_id, holder_id, company_id, start_date, end_date, premium) VALUES ('4629f64f-8730-4c52-ae5c-5bbd11292e30', '502b3590-6075-4e09-9749-ceb34c8aae3d', '8a952241-12e3-46f4-a9cd-89185fb97e25', '2022-01-01', '2023-01-01', 500.75) ON CONFLICT (policy_id) DO UPDATE SET holder_id='502b3590-6075-4e09-9749-ceb34c8aae3d', company_id='8a952241-12e3-46f4-a9cd-89185fb97e25', start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2023-01-01', premium=500.75;
UPSERT INTO policyholders (id, name, email) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com');
UPSERT INTO policies (policy_id, policyholder_id, policy_type, policy_amount) VALUES (1, 1, 'Health Insurance', 500);
UPSERT INTO agents (agent_id, name, email, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'Jane Smith', 'jane.smith@example.com', '123-456-7890');

UPSERT INTO Customers (id, name, email, phone) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone = '123-456-7890'

UPSERT INTO Policies (id, policy_number, policy_type, customer_id) VALUES (1, 'POL001', 'Life Insurance', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE policy_number = 'POL001', policy_type = 'Life Insurance', customer_id = 1

UPSERT INTO Claims (id, claim_number, date, amount, customer_id) VALUES (1, 'CLM001', '2022-01-15', 1000.00, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE claim_number = 'CLM001', date = '2022-01-15', amount = 1000.00, customer_id = 1
